Gift to Kim Jong Il from Egyptian Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Egyptian Figure 
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Yehia Jakariya Khairallah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study
of the Juche Idea.
 The gift was handed to the DPRK ambassador to Egypt by the chairman on Feb. 15.    
 There the chairman said that they wish Kim Jong Il invariable health and happiness in constantly developing and enriching the Juche idea that lights the path of the present times.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Libyan Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Libyan Leader 
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Colonel Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of Libya, on the occasion of his birthday.
 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned by Mahmoud Masoud Amer, acting secretary of the People's Bureau of Libya in Pyongyang, on Feb. 21.

Greetings to Guyanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guyanese President
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Guyanese President Bharrat Jagdeo on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the proclamation of the Cooperative Republic of Guyana.
 The message expressed the belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably in the future, too, and sincerely wished the Guyanese people progress, prosperity and well-being.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Brunei Darussalam Sultan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Brunei Darussalam Sultan
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan of the Brunei Darussalam, on the occasion of
its national day.
 The message wished the friendly people of the Brunei Darussalam new progress, prosperity and well-being, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would favorably develop.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Greets Brunei Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Greets Brunei Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Brunei Foreign Minister Mohamad Bolkiah.
 The message extended warm felicitations to him on the national day of Brunei Darussalam, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to grow in scope and develop favorably.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Meets Outgoing Polish Ambassador
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets Outgoing Polish Ambassador
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today met and had a talk with Polish Ambassador e.p. to the DPRK Wojciech Kaluza when the latter paid a farewell call on him.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Wraps Up Its Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Wraps Up Its Visit to DPRK
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation led by Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, left here today after concluding its four-day visit to the DPRK.
 The delegation was seen off at the airport by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the embassy.    
 During its stay the delegation visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung. It also visited the venue of the 9th Kimjongilia Festival, the West Sea Barrage, the Taean Heavy Machine Complex and the construction site of the Taean Friendship Glass Factory now rising as a symbol of the DPRK-China friendship. The delegation appreciated a performance given by the State Symphony Orchestra.

articles.title: Korea-Kuwait Friendship Association Formed
articles.content:
Korea-Kuwait Friendship Association Formed
    Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Korea-Kuwait Friendship Association was held here on Tuesday on the occasion of the 44th national day and the 14th liberation day of Kuwait.
 At the ceremony, Jon Hyon Chan, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, was elected chairman of the association which consists of officials in the fields of education, culture, public health and sports.
